name: UOB Personal Loan
approval_days_note: Up to 7 business days with complete documentation
special_features: No processing fee, no guarantor, no collateral
Up to RM400 cashback for new applicants
Existing UOB cardholders get preferential rates (up to 2% lower)
Priority banking members: up to 15× monthly income (vs 10× standard)
Early settlement fee: 3% of total or RM300, whichever higher
Min credit score: 650 (CTOS/CCRIS); 720+ for lowest rates

name: UOB Balance Transfer Instalment
amount_max_note: Up to 80% of credit limit (bank discretion)
rate_display: New cardholders: 6m 0% / 12m 1% upfront; Existing: 6m 3% / 12m 4% upfront; Standard 3.80% p.a. EIR
approval_days_note: PDS states min transfer RM1,000; max up to 80% of credit limit. SLA not stated.
special_features: No early termination penalty
One-time upfront fee structure (not monthly interest)
After promo period: 18% p.a. standard credit card rate applies
Min monthly payment: 5% of outstanding or RM50

name: UOB Easi-Payment / 0% IPP (Transaction Conversion)
rate_display: Flat 3.99% p.a. options; 0% IPP by merchant/tenure; up to 60–68 months
approval_days_note: Bank FAQ: conversion on non-UOB terminals processed in ~3–8 days; varies by merchant/batch.

name: UOB Intelligent Home Loan (iHL)
reference_rates: SBR 2.75% (effective July 11, 2025; note: UOB website may show 3.00%)
approval_days_note: Pre-approval may be faster; legal/valuation steps extend timeline. Official SLA not disclosed.
special_features: Floating rate (SBR-linked)
Refinancing allowed
Tenure up to 35 years
Max financing up to 95% (with MRTA)

name: UOB Flexi Mortgage (Offset-Linked)
rate_display: Offset-linked floating; tenure up to 35 years / age 70
approval_days_note: Bank highlights flexibility; SLA not published.

name: UOB Home Refinancing (Conventional)
rate_display: Refinance existing loans to UOB; package-based pricing
approval_days_note: Dependent on legal & valuation; no fixed SLA online.

name: UOB Home Financing-i
approval_days_note: No SLA published; follows Islamic facility process.
special_features: Contracted Profit Rate (ceiling rate protection)
Effective Profit Rate (variable, SBRI-based)
Tenure up to 35 years or age 70
Open prepayment allowed
100% stamp duty discount for refinancing from conventional to Islamic

name: UOB Auto Loan (Hire Purchase)
rate_display: Rate not publicly disclosed (contact bank for quote; market range 2.4%–3.5% p.a.)
approval_days_note: Official page not found; third-party reference indicates offering and income requirement.
special_features: U-Drive green financing for electric vehicles
Exclusive promotions for UOB Privilege Banking customers

name: UOB BizMoney (Unsecured SME Loan)
rate_display: From 0.38% per month (≈4.56% p.a. flat rate)
approval_days_note: Site markets fast response; exact SLA not published. Disbursement: 3-5 business days after document completion.
special_features: Unsecured loan (no collateral)
Fixed interest rate throughout tenure
No processing fee or legal fees
Personal guarantee from shareholders/directors required
Min 3 years operating history

name: UOB BizProperty / Commercial Property Financing
rate_display: Property-backed; refinancing options; MoF as per policy

name: UOB Government/Agency Schemes (e.g., SJPP)
rate_display: As per scheme terms; guarantees up to ~80% (SJPP reference)
approval_days_note: Subject to agency approval and collateral/legal.
